body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia         NPS   Hyde Park Trails and Garden Cell Phone Tours Download and print a PDF directory to the trail Cell Phone Tours Your cell phone is your guide, providing narrations about Hyde Park's historic landscapes from six of Hyde Park's Trails. Call directly from the trail to hear more about Hyde Park's rich legacy. Just watch for cell phone tour markers, call 845-475-3819, and enter the stop number.         Audio Podcasts from The Hyde Park Explorer, Sounds & Stories, Beatrix Farrand Garden and Podcasts by Students for Students.        Filming at Home of FDR NPS/Bill Urbin   Videos of the Roosevelt-Vanderbilt National Historic Sites        Val-Kill Cottage NPS/Bill Urbin   Photo Gallery from the Eleanor Roosevelt National Historic Site
title: Eleanor Roosevelt National Historic Site: Photos & Multimedia
